extendedInfo.description: Dirty Phrase Snatch!---Dirty Phrase snatch is a phrase guessing game for adults!Nothing starts off the night like sitting around with a group of your close friends, trying to describe a "Squish Mitten".  Nothing beats coming back from the bar (or frat party) and getting your friends to guess "Reservoir Tip".  Nothing beats Dirty Phrase Snatch!FEATURES:*FREE! (Ad supported.  Full version does not have ads and adds ability to look up words on urban dictionary!)*Hundreds of hilarious ADULT words and phrases!*Different sounds for when a word is guessed or skipped, so you KNOW who's cheating!*Two modes: Classic mode with a timer, or a casual mode if you're just looking to relax*Similar to Catch Phrase or Phrase Party, but with an ADULT word list!NOTE:Suggestions for phrases for this game came from all genders, creeds, races, and sexual orientations.  While some may find the words and phrases to be highly offensive, this game is intended for entertainment only and NOT as any sort of attack on any gender/race/creed/sexual orientation.  If you are easily offended you may want to reconsider playing this game!---Questions, comments or bug reports?epicallyawesomeapps@gmail.comTwitter: EAApps

reviews.title: Great! As good as CAH!
reviews.comment: This game is the best adult party game! Up there with cards against humanity. People need to understand the rules before they give out bad ratings.
